snippet: Radical moves have helped for Ray Cappo, the singer for the heavy metal band Youth of Today, to lead the way from a life as a rocker to one as a spiritual coach.
abstract: Ray Cappo, former singer for heavy metal band Youth of Today, left rock world in late '80s to seek more spiritual life; has since become famous in yoga community for classes featuring complicated inversions and anti-gravity poses.
lead_paragraph: Radical moves have helped for Ray Cappo, the singer for the heavy metal band Youth of Today, to lead the way from a life as a rocker to one as a spiritual coach.

headline.seo: Heavy Metal Rocker Now Lifts Spirits as the Yogi Raghunath
